subject: part-time job [Fri, 13 Apr 2007 03:39:08 -0800]
body: "Where'd you bury him?    burnham   carboy    Fact is, you're getting worse, Annie, aren't you?"She was working herself into one of her patented Annie Wilkes frenzies and he knew he should try and say something which would at least temporarily defuse her, but his mouth seemed numb and useless.  Here was the church.    "Annie's brow darkened.   "That's one thing I really want to know. When it was done, he put the pen aside.    When she turned Paul seized the Royal, unmindful of the blisters its hot right side was printing on his already swollen right hand.     The Royal typewriter made a shitty writing machine, but as an exercise tool it was great.  blackboard
